tvdb: Alison fears Rafe might die again battling Caleb.  Rafe officially proposes with an engagement ring to put her mind at ease, however, he later sneaks out with a gun.  Lucy learns Tess spent the night at Ian's and also the results of Tess's DNA test.  When Ian defends Tess, Lucy accuses him of having feelings for her.  Tess tells Ian to tell Lucy the truth- that he loves Lucy.  Jack accuses Livvie of using Caleb to lure him back, but Livvie angrily denies this.  When a loud noise startles them, they both apologize and Jack comforts Livvie as an unseen Tess witnesses.  Ian admits to Lucy he does love her.
